TopicTitle: How do you use the map and change between UI mode on xbox.

Articles.Content: On xbox you hit Y, then have to select UI mode, then pause the game and now you can click on your ship to do the research stuff. 1 thats way to much to just click stuff on the UI. 2 I can't for the life of me figure out how to switch back to controling the rocket. And I don't understand the map, I've seen videos of people make markers and then theres a trajectory line and a icon on the ball thing but I can't figure out how to do that, I cant even figure out how to zoom in. The controls on console are just so bad.
Making markers and that sort of thing only come when you've upgraded your Tracking Station to Tier 2. But I play on PC, so I don't know anything about the rest of it.
